Package bg.tu_varna.f22621629.models

Class Image

java.lang.Object
bg.tu_varna.f22621629.models.Image
Direct Known Subclasses:
ImagePBM, ImagePGM, ImagePPM
public class Image extends Object
Represents an image with its pixel data, size, name, format, and content.

    Constructs an Image object with specified pixel data, size, image name, and format.

  • Constructor Details

    • Image

      public Image(Pixel[][] pixels, int[] sizes, String imageName, String format)
      Constructs an Image object with specified pixel data, size, image name, and format.
      Parameters:
      pixels - The 2D array of Pixel objects representing the image.
      sizes - The array containing width and height of the image.
      imageName - The name of the image file.
      format - The format of the image ("P1", "P2", or "P3").

  • Method Details

      public String getFormat()
      Returns the format of the image.
      Returns:
      The format of the image ("P1", "P2", or "P3").

      Returns the 2D array of Pixel objects representing the image.

      The 2D array of Pixel objects.

      Parameters:

      Returns the name of the image.

      Sets the sizes of the image (width and height).

    • setFormat

      public void setFormat(String format)
      Sets the format of the image.
      Parameters:
      format - The format of the image ("P1", "P2", or "P3") to set.

    • setContentFromPixels

      public void setContentFromPixels()
      Generates the content of the image from its pixel data. This method is used to update the internal content based on the current pixel data.
